snippet: Matt Holliday hit a grand slam, capping a seven-run 10th inning, as St. Louis defeated Cincinnati and extended its lead in the National League Central.
abstract: Baseball Roundup;  St Louis Cardinals beat Cincinnati Reds, 11-4; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Matt Holliday hit a grand slam, capping a seven-run 10th inning, as St. Louis defeated Cincinnati and extended its lead in the National League Central.

headline.seo: Tigers’ Jose Alvarez Dazzles in Debut, Then Returns to Minors
headline.main: Cardinals Erupt in 10th to Beat Reds
headline.print_headline: Cardinals Erupt in 10th To Beat Reds
